items.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Andras advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

items.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

items.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.
